definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs

sentences.english: Yue Fu Yuan white, handed down the long poems.
sentences.chinese: 乐府元白体，诗文传世长。

sentences.english: Recall Ancient Literature is a collection of poetry by Fang Chengxun, who is from Huizhou in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《复初集》是明代徽州人方承训的诗文集。

sentences.english: Poem Wen-Yi simple, but the first sentence needs some explanation.
sentences.chinese: 此诗文义显浅，但首句需略加解释。

sentences.english: Houzhi origin of the official family, who have received formal education, and poems.
sentences.chinese: 侯芝出身儒门仕宦之家，从小受过正统教育，能诗文。

sentences.english: The author yields five lost works from poems collection in Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 笔者从清人诗文集中辑得佚文五篇。

sentences.english: Identify his anti- Confucianism by analyzing Ji Kang's poems and prose.
sentences.chinese: 通过分析诗文来厘清嵇康的反儒色彩。

sentences.english: The year of poetry creation is the basic work of Liu Ji study.
sentences.chinese: 诗文系年是刘基研究的基础性工作。

sentences.english: And many a holy text around she strews.
sentences.chinese: 在四周撒下了许多圣经诗文。

sentences.english: Luo Yin was well-known as a poet in the late Tang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 罗隐在晚唐以诗文名世，其实他也是一位哲学家。

sentences.english: His poems and articles have been adopted by many anthologies and dictionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 诗文成果名录被多种选集和辞书登载。

sentences.english: His life instinct of insistence and nature is revealed invariably in his poetry.
sentences.chinese: 在他的诗文中，无处不表露出他任真自然的本性。

sentences.english: Although there are many different points about the thought origin of the Drinking- subject in Tao Yuanming's works.
sentences.chinese: 有关陶渊明涉酒诗文的思想渊源，历来说法不一。

sentences.english: Poetry paintings, they will only painting.
sentences.chinese: 诗文字画，他们只会绘画。

sentences.english: Tao Yuanming's posies show very unique style and great and high attainments in citation.
sentences.chinese: 陶渊明诗文创作在艺术上具有独特风格和极高的造诣。

sentences.english: Chapter IV, exploring the emotional tendency of Su Zhe's tourism poetry.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，苏辙旅游诗文的情感倾向探究。

sentences.english: In this way he got me to translate the whole play.
sentences.chinese: 如此这样，他让我把全剧都译成了孟加拉诗文。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
a pre-Tang Dynasty genre of poetry, relatively free in form, usually having four, five, six or seven characters per line
couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
